scripts.kill-port: f(){ pid=$(lsof -ti:$1); [ -n "$pid" ] && kill -9 $pid && echo 'Killed process on port '$1 || echo 'No process on port '$1; }; f
scripts.build:framework: npm run build -w @broccoliapps/shared && npm run build -w @broccoliapps/backend -w @broccoliapps/frontend -w @broccoliapps/infra -w @broccoliapps/dev-tools -w @broccoliapps/browser -w @broccoliapps/mobile
scripts.dotcom: npm run build:framework && npm run dev -w @broccoliapps/dotcom
scripts.deploy:dotcom: npm run build:framework && npm run deploy -w @broccoliapps/dotcom
scripts.nwm:web: npm run build:framework && npm run dev -w @broccoliapps/nwm-web
scripts.deploy:nwm: npm run build:framework && npm run deploy -w @broccoliapps/nwm-web
scripts.tasquito:web: npm run build:framework && npm run dev -w @broccoliapps/tasquito-web
scripts.deploy:tasquito: npm run build:framework && npm run deploy -w @broccoliapps/tasquito-web
